name: 2 Ball Pool HD
description:
The makers of the hit game Hunting are back with a brand new, addictive, free, puzzle with sport (Combo game) !

Try out New Two Ball Pools Games...

Additional levels coming soon!

=> WHY YOU’LL LOVE TWO BALL POOLS =
=> FREE to play!
=> ADVENTURE & Creative through 110 addictingly fun levels
=> CONNECT Dots, sink anchors, make bombs, extinguish flames, and much more
=> ENJOY beautiful minimalistic design and relaxing game music
=> PLAY at your own pace to figure out the perfect move without having to worry about a clock
=> CHALLENGE your friends on Facebook
